# Lexicographer

## What do you want to know??

***Maybe*** allow for turning spaces (` `)--regex with absence of known meaningful characters?--into `NA`s, also?

- Names of columns
- Apparent data type of columns 
- Are recognizable NAs present?
- % recognizable NA 
- Number of unique values 

## What else??

- Are there pure word characters (no spaces or special characters or punctuation)?
- Is there punctuation?
- Are there special characters? 
- Are there numbers? 
- Does something appear to be "yes" or "no" or "true" or "false" or a manual NA?
